cards.title: Consistency
cards.description: With clear guidelines and alignment between all team members, your product will feel whole, not broken into smaller pieces.

cards.title: Speed
cards.description: Reusable assets allow you to solve a user need once and reuse it anywhere quickly. You can also pick and match to create designs faster.

cards.title: Scale
cards.description: By having reusable and flexible assets, you can accomodate for different channels and platforms, and combine them for creative solutions.
